name: Stone Shape
targets: stone or stone object touched, up to 10 cu. ft. + 1 cu. ft./level
description: You can form an existing piece of stone into any shape that suits your purpose. While it's possible to make crude coffers, doors, and so forth with stone shape, fine detail isn't possible. There is a 30% chance that any shape including moving parts simply doesn't work.Mythic Stone Shape
